casebody.data:
David SWIFT, Jr., a Minor, by his Father, David Swift, Sr., and his Mother, Esther Swift, as Parents and Next Friends, and David Swift, Sr., and Esther Swift, in Their Own Rights, v. Otha HOFFER and Paul Keslar, Appellants. No. 8356. Circuit Court of Appeals, Third Circuit. Ai-gued Nov. 4, 1943. Decided Nov. 18, 1943. Rehearing Denied Dec. 11, 1943. Carl W. Brueck, of Pittsburgh, Pa., for appellant Hoffer. Paul E. Hutchinson, of Pittsburgh, Pa. (Sheriff, Lindsay, Weis & Hutchinson, of Pittsburgh, Pa., on the brief), for appellant Keslar. James P. McArdle, of Pittsburgh, Pa. (Harry J. Nesbit, of Pittsburgh, Pa., on the brief), for appellee.

Before BIGGS, GOODRICH, and Mc-LAUGHLIN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment of the court below is affirmed.
